name: ''Real''
description:
"Real" is my submission to the Ludum Dare 33, whose theme was "You are the monster".

Do you think creatures from other worlds, like video games, exist? What makes you different from them? They have a body, a brain, just like you. And if it tells them they exist, wouldn't it mean it is true?

I really love this subject, and I had a lot of fun making this game. It's far from perfect, especially gameplay-wise, but I managed to make a cinematic for the ending, with an explanation of what I think, so I'm pretty happy with the prototype.
